job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: pWe are seeking a Senior Data Engineer to help us build our highly programmable and scalable data pipelines from the ground up using public cloud infrastructure and services Your position requires handson development and data schema modeling while collaborating closely with the team in driving the critical technical decisions and infrastructure needed to launch support and ramp the product in a fastpaced environment You are a thinkerdoer who can think broadly Still deep dive into details align with product management on requirements and priorities towards producing a bestinclass product experience and help shape the team cultureppbrppuRecommended Skillsspan classqlcursorspanupulliExtensive background in CS or equivalent experienceliliA deep understanding of Cloud data warehouseslakes relational databases distributed systems Massively Parallel Processing MPP databases and NoSQL databasesnbspliliExperience developing and optimizing largescale batch and realtime data pipelinesliliAble to build robust reliable and scalable data infrastructureliliDemonstrated ability to architect and implement data pipelines and data modelsliliAn analytics mindset to analyze large data sets to identify gaps and inconsistencies provide data insights and advance effective product solutionsliliExperience performing in ETL with a combination of SQL and pythonnbspliliShipped products and worked across teamsliliExcellent communication skills both written and verballiulpbrppuBenefitsupulliMacBook AirProliliVision dental and medical plan choicesliliFlexible working hoursliliCompetitive salary amp 401KliliFlexiblePersonal Time OffliliEmployee Stock Purchase Plans and other financial benefitsliliPaid Holidaysliulpbrp
